name: King of the Clouds
description:
This is a game made for a school project where I worked together with 2 of my classmates. The Assignment was to create and document any game we wanted using Adobe Animate and Flash.

One day the world was robed of its collor by a misterious being way up in the clouds the King of the Clouds. You play as a ghost to give back collor to the world by deveating him. Allong the way you'l have to treverse deverent platfoming levels filled with the king's minions. Each level can be played as many times as you want as you try to beat your shortest time while collecting all the starts.
